entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
ISOLATED SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE MORNING, THEN SCATTERED SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HUMID WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT
HIGHEST HEAT INDEX READINGS HEAT INDEX READINGS UP TO 106 IN THE AFTERNOON

PARTLY CLOUDY
HUMID WITH LOWS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HOT WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
HIGHEST HEAT INDEX READINGS HEAT INDEX READINGS UP TO 109 IN THE AFTERNOON

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
HUMID WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

MOSTLY CLEAR
HOT
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 90S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 70S

SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HOT WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT
HIGHEST HEAT INDEX READINGS HEAT INDEX READINGS UP TO 110 IN THE AFTERNOON

PARTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
